{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Lite-On_WN6503AH_(Samsung) |wikipedia = |brand = Lite-On |model = WN6503AH |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = (Samsung) |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = February 12, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Lite-On_WN6503AH_(Samsung) |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = (half) |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0030 |subvendor_id = 144d |subdevice_id = 4107 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PPD-AR5BHB116 |icid = 4104A-AR5BHB116 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 74:E5:43 |chip1 = Atheros;AR9382;AR9382-AL1A; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/23/2010 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''[[Samsung]]''' P/N for this module may be '''BA59-03047A'''. "WN6503AH V02 323C1623229D" is silkscreened on the board of this particular module. ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Qualcomm Atheros AR93xx Wireless Network Adapter [168c:0030] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd Device [144d:4107]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (64-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=128K]
        [virtual] Expansion ROM at f0400000 [disabled] [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 3
        Capabilities: [50] MSI: Enable- Count=1/4 Maskable+ 64bit+
        Capabilities: [70] Express Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [140] Virtual Channel
        Capabilities: [300] Device Serial Number 00-00-00-00-00-00-00-00
        Kernel driver in use: ath9k
===dmesg dump=== 
pci 0000:05:00.0: [168c:0030] type 00 class 0x028000
pci 0000:05:00.0: reg 0x10: [mem 0x00000000-0x0001ffff 64bit]
pci 0000:05:00.0: reg 0x30: [mem 0x00000000-0x0000ffff pref]
pci 0000:05:00.0: supports D1
pci 0000:05:00.0: PME# supported from D0 D1 D3hot
pci 0000:05:00.0: BAR 0: assigned [mem 0xf1d00000-0xf1d1ffff 64bit]
pci 0000:05:00.0: BAR 6: assigned [mem 0xf0400000-0xf040ffff pref]
pci 0000:05:00.0: no hotplug settings from platform
ath9k 0000:05:00.0: enabling device (0000 -> 0002)
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x6a
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: 00
ath: Regpair used: 0x6a
ieee80211 phy4: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
ieee80211 phy4: Atheros AR9300 Rev:3 mem=0xffffc90007bc0000, irq=19
===cat /sys/kernel/ieee80211/phyX/ath9k/base_eeprom=== 
mTOR ath9k # cat base_eeprom
